title: Kinesthetic Learning Path for Animation Enthusiasts
description: This personalized learning path is designed for individuals with an intermediate level of familiarity with basic animation concepts who prefer a kinesthetic learning style. Through hands-on activities and physical interaction, you will explore the world of animation and develop your skills in a practical manner.

milestones.title: Introduction to Animation Principles
milestones.description: Understand the foundational principles of animation and how they contribute to creating compelling motion sequences.

resources.title: Animate Your Name Activity
resources.description: Hands-on activity to animate your name using basic animation principles

milestones.title: Character Design and Animation
milestones.description: Learn how to design and animate characters, focusing on expressing personality and movement.

resources.title: Character Animation Workshop
resources.description: Interactive workshop on character design and animation

milestones.title: Storyboarding and Scene Creation
milestones.description: Explore the art of storytelling through storyboarding and creating engaging scenes.

resources.title: Storyboarding Hands-On Activity
resources.description: Hands-on activity to create a storyboard for a short animation scene

prerequisites: Some familiarity with basic animation concepts
